Hi Janina, 

Thanks for getting back to us. 

Regarding the services, it will be too tight to have 3 to a row as the space is quite narrow due to the side bar. We have however spanned the last service across the row so that it looks more even. 

Regarding the NDIS popup, yes this is active on the home page and yes the COVID one comes over the top of it. 

Regarding the dot points, we have pulled them over to the left. 

Hope that all works for you?

Thanks Heath.

We've made a few changes on our end too!

Quick one, as we can't do flip boxes, do you think we can have the different services in rows of 3? There are a total of 9 an d thought this would spread out the services more evenly.

Also - with the NDIS pop up, can you confirm that has been completed? The COVID pop up seems to intervene with that but all good if that's the case as COVID message is priority.

With the below, the alignment of the dotpoints is quite far on the right. Is there anyway to move more left-aligned like the rest of the text in the box? See screen shot below.



Many thanks,

Janina

Hi Janina, 

Confirming we have made the below changes and the popup is now on the home page. 

Regarding the Flip box style boxes, we have not been able to add them to the site in its current form. We can look at this once we rebuild the Metro site to be as extendable as the RR site.

Hey Heath,

How did you go with the pop-up?

Also, have a few more changes to the NDIS Therapy Supports landing page.

See below:

Header image to be replaced - TBC until we agree internally. I'll keep you posted on this.

Can you please add the NDIS logo up above the below "Contact NDIS Therapy Supports on" CTA? Please also remove the PATIENT PROGRAMS heading. Please also make the CTA box in the same gradient colours like the bottom Enquire form. Can we also add a brochure call out up here too?



Please can you add the registered trademark after PD Warrior? ®

Can we ensure all alignment of text is consistent? E.g. see below heading and text.



Can we try a similar style to Sexuality Service "flip box" style for the text for all the below disciplines?



Any questions, let me know.

Many thanks,

Janina

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


We would like to make a few revisions to the below landing page:

https://www.metrorehab.com.au/ndis-services/

We are renaming the offering to "NDIS Therapy Supports".

Please see attached brief for all updates.

Can you please:
  • Amend the landing page with the requested changes
  • Create a pop-up similar to the EksoNR pop-up you've created and place on the following pages:

https://www.metrorehab.com.au/ndis-services/ (URL to be updated as per attached brief)

https://www.metrorehab.com.au/

  • Create a new referral form link to NDIS Therapy Supports (PDF to be provided)
  • Create additional CTAs on the landing page to go to this NDIS Therapy Supports referral link


All the details are in the attached document.


See below for NDIS logo. We would like this to be quite prominent throughout the landing page.

https://we.tl/t-w2kua2KK8Z

Any questions, please let me know.

Thank you,
Janina
JANINA HIPOLITO​
